description: bank shaped like a suitcase with movable handle; gold straps, red trim, light green body; coin slot below handle
inscription:
Inscriptions; Mark

on both sides, in balck: [LOUIS/ MARK + CO/ 200 5th AVE/ NEW YORK, NY]
on back, in black and red: [MADE IN U.S.A.]
markings: manufacturer\'s mark on both sides: red circle with black x edge to edge, [M] on right of x; [R] on left; [A] in center at junction of arms of [K]; [TOYS] at bottom of circle; many travel stickers front and back
title: "Suitcase" still bank
